        def initialize(data = [], page = 1, limit = 10, var = 'pager')
          @data, @page, @limit, @var = data, page, limit, var
          @pager = pager_for(data)
          @page = @page > page_count ? page_count : @page
          @pager = pager_for(data)
        end
